lines: Your wife has accepted an invitation for the two of you to dine with friends of hers from high school that you ABSOLUTELY HATE. Tammy, an ex-cheerleader, is still childish and giggly, and wears her hair in pigtails. Hank, her husband,
chews with his mouth open and likes to talk about his and Tammy's sexual exploits in public.
#GET ANGRY AT YOUR WIFE FOR MAKING THE DATE WITHOUT TALKING TO YOU ABOUT IT
#GO AND TOLERATE YOUR WIFE'S FRIENDS JUST TO MAKE HER HAPPY
What will you ultimately do as a result of your anger?
Your wife becomes upset and begins to cry. What will she tell her friends?
Will you try to make her feel guilty about it?

When you arrive, Hank and Tammy greet you. They are serving English Muffin pizzas for dinner. As you walk into the dining room, Hank stares right at your wife's bottom and mentions that she looks like she has "nice, tight buns, heh, heh."
#THREATEN TO PUNCH HANK SQUARELY IN THE MOUTH IF HE CONTINUES ALONG THESE LINES
#ASK HANK IF HE WOULD BE KIND ENOUGH TO EVOLVE INTO A FORM THAT DOESN'T DRAG ITS KNUCKLES ON THE FLOOR WHEN IT WALKS
This causes a loud argument. It is a perfect excuse to end the night early. Your wife begins to realize that they aren't the type of people worth socializing with.

Of course he doesn't understand what you are talking about, but he senses you have put him down. He is not intelligent enough to think of a response so he just ignores you for the rest of the night. No great loss.
Unfortunately, he only gets worse. You can:
#PULL YOUR WIFE ASIDE AND TELL HER YOU WANT TO GO BEFORE YOU EXPLODE
Your wife doesn't remember Hank being this bad, but certainly understands. You'll never go back there again.
How can you tolerate this kind of degrading comment directed at your wife? Either you are a wimp, or you and Hank are two of a kind. Get with it.
This puts your wife in a difficult position, since she already accepted. Can't you forgive her and go along, just this once?
Just wait until the next time you want to go to dinner at YOUR friend's house.
